problem.markdown:
>>If the diameter of the cable is doubled what happens to the maximum load:<< ( ) it decreases by a factor of 2 ( ) it is doubled (x) it increases by a factor of 4 ( ) it decreases by a factor of 4
[explanation] Diameter and allowable load are directly proportional. [explanation]
problem.p: If the diameter of the cable is doubled what happens to the maximum load:

choicegroup.label: If the diameter of the cable is doubled what happens to the maximum load:
choicegroup.choice: it decreases by a factor of 2
it increases by a factor of 4
it decreases by a factor of 4

div.p: Diameter and allowable load are directly proportional.
